name: Twist-Tac-Toe
description:
Controls:

WASD - Camera

Left/Right OR Up/Down arrow keys - Move selection/Change piece

Tab - Toggle rotation mode

Enter (Return) - Confirm selection

Right Shift - Cancel selection

Guide:

The game starts out with a 3x3 area highlighted. Use the arrow keys to move this selection box. Press enter to confirm your selection and move onto the next selection mode. Once your selected box is outlined in red, use the arrow keys to select a piece and press enter to confirm it's shape and position. Right shift is used to move back in the selection process.

Tab toggles between the rotate mode and the select mode. In rotate mode (blue highlight), use arrow keys to select the axis you would like to rotate. Enter confirms and allows you to use arrow keys to select a slice along the axis you selected. Press enter again to confirm that slice, and then use the arrow keys again to select the amount of rotation. Enter finishes the rotation process. Use right shift to cancel rotations/selections and tab to exit the rotation mode.
